mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_dog (no, id, area, dtype, dsex, dkg, dcolor,category, dcharacter, tel, FILENAME, FILESIZE,dname ,dage, lfdate ) VALUES(board_dog_no_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{area}, #{dtype}, #{dsex}, #{dkg}, #{dcolor},#{category}, #{dcharacter}, #{tel} ,#{filename}, #{filesize},#{dname},#{dage}, #{lfdate})
mapper.select: SELECT no,dname,dtype,area,filename,category,TO_CHAR(lfdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DLFDATE,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday FROM board_dog WHERE ${fs} LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%'
